3.text: It is a fine Saturday afternoon.The sun is shining brightly. Nipun and his friendsVignesh, Sithuli, Rizvi and Amanda are in the park with their families. Rizvi is climbing up a rope ladder. His little brother Niaz is riding a pony. This is his first pony

Rizvi is climbing up a rope ladder. His little brother Niaz is riding a pony. This is his first pony</prosody></speak>

4.text: ride. His father is walking beside him.Niaz is smiling happily. Nipun and Vignesh are playing cricket.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>ride. His father is walking beside him.Niaz is smiling happily. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='nipun'>Nipun</phoneme> and Vignesh are playing cricket.</prosody></speak>

5.text: Vignesh is batting and Nipun is bowling. Amanda is sliding down a slide. Her twin sisters, Sharon and Rebecca are playing on a see- saw. Sithuli is feeding the fish in the pond. Their mothers are sitting on the grass, watching them at play. An ice-cream seller is standing by the gate. Two children are running to buy some ice-cream.
